pitchRateLearnerSteps.intro:
Welcome to the Pitch Learner Rating Page

This page allows you to rate a learner.
Click here to view the instructions on how to rate a learner
This section allows you to choose ratings for a learner
This scetion allows you to choose if you would like the learner to join Andela
This section allows you to add a comment about the learner you are rating
Click on this button to see a preview of your ratings and submit them
